articles.title: Kim Jong Un Tours Mangyongdae Funfair
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Tours Mangyongdae Funfair
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, toured the Mangyongdae Funfair. 
					 The Mangyongdae Funfair is a cultural recreation ground for the people and an entertainment and educational center built by the great loving care and benevolence by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who were always considerate of providing the Korean people with more affluent and highly civilized life.
					
					 Covering 70 hectares, the funfair has the first-phase funfair built in Kalmaeji Field and the second-phase one and a wading pool built on an expansion basis in Songsan Field.
					
					 The funfair has made positive contribution to the entertainment of people and school youth and children for decades.
					
					 He looked round various places of the funfair to acquaint himself in detail with its management and operation. 
					
					 In front of the swingboat in the second-phase funfair, he, pointing at the seriously broken pavement in the compound of the funfair, asked officials when the road was last re-paved. It is regretful that the road has not been managed well, he said.
					
					 Putting his finger on the faulty arrangement of the bases of Oriental arborvitae and Sabina Chinensis, he said it would be good to have gravel stones planted in various shapes around the trees. 
					
					 Seeing the weeds grown in between pavement blocks in the compound of the funfair, he, with an irritated look, plucked them up one by one. He said in an excited tone that he has never thought that the funfair is under such a bad state and a proverb that the darkest place is under the candlestick fits the funfair. He scolded officials, saying why such things do not come in their sight and querying could the officials of the funfair work like this, had they had the attitude befitting master, affection for their work sites and conscience to serve the people. Plucking up weeds can be done easily with hands as it is different from updating facilities, he added.  
					
					 Saying that the amusement facilities have been put into operation with the paint scraped off, he noted that the officials and care-takers of the funfair have below-zero spirit of serving the people. This is not just a business issue but an issue concerning ideological viewpoint, he said in a serious tone.
					
					 He dropped in at the fountain pool where he stressed the need to tidy up the place even though it may not go operational for this or that reason. 
					
					 Officials should draw a serious lesson from the tour of Mangyongdae Funfair, he said, adding that this occasion should be taken to issue a serious warning to the officials so that they can have proper spirit of serving the people. 
					
					 He called for sprucing up the Mangyongdae Funfair as required by the Songun era. This process should be made an occasion of removing outdated ideological point of view from the heads of officials and ending their old work-style, he added.
					
					 He set forth the tasks for sprucing up the funfair. 
					
					 He gave Choe Ryog Hae, director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army, the task for sprucing up the funfair as required by the new century by dispatching strong construction forces of the KPA. 
					
					 The officials of the relevant fields including the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, ministries and national institutions should fulfill their duties and responsibilities in sprucing up the funfair to implement the WPK's intention of serving people in practice. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae and Ma Won Chun, vice- department director of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in Meeting of Land Management
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in Meeting of Land Management
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with the participants in a meeting of activists of the general mobilization movement for land management. 
					 He waved back to their enthusiastic cheers, giving a warm encouragement to them.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that all the service personnel and people including the participants in the meeting would carry out leader Kim Jong Il's idea of land management and his last instructions without any slight deviation and concession so as to drastically change the appearance of the land to suit the features of a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 He was accompanied by leading officials of party, state and military organs Choe Yong Rim, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Ki Nam, Ri Myong Su, Mun Kyong Dok, Ro Tu Chol, Ri Ryong Ha and chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the WPK.

articles.title: Cuban Ambassador Gives Reception to Mark Day of Sun
articles.content:
Cuban Ambassador Gives Reception to Mark Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK German Hermin Ferras Alvarez gave a reception at his embassy on May 9 on the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Yong Il, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and officials concerned.
					
					 Staff members of the Cuban embassy here were on hand.
					
					 German Hermin Ferras Alvarez said in his speech that Kim Il Sung will clarify the way of defending the prosperity and sovereignty of the country while being always alive with the Korean people.
					
					 The Korean people have made great advance under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, true to the cause of leader Kim Jong Il, he said, and went on:
					
					 The Cuban people will always stand by the Korean people carrying on the struggle for socialist construction and the sovereignty and reunification of the country.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop in his speech said that every year the Cuban people celebrate the Day of the Sun with the Korean people, adding that this is a reflection of their deep reverence for the President.
					
					 The President performed immortal feats to shine in history with his profound ideology and theory and dynamic revolutionary practice, he added.
					
					 The DPRK government will consolidate and develop the militant friendship and bond of cooperation with Cuba on the basis of the revolutionary and comradely obligation, he concluded.

articles.title: Congratulations to Prime Minister of Russia
articles.content:
Congratulations to Prime Minister of Russia
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim in a message on Wednesday congratulated Dmitri Anatoliyevich Medvedev on his appointment as prime minister of Russia.
					 Choe in the message expressed belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Russia would constantly develop in line with the agreements reached between the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					 He wished his Russian counterpart success in his responsible work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Lao Women's Union Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Lao Women's Union Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Lao Women's Union headed by Sysay Leudedmounsone, president of its Central Committee, arrived here by air on May 9.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from President of Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from President of Equatorial Guinea
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, president of Equatorial Guinea, on April 26.
					 The message said:
					
					 Respected friend Your Excellency First Chairman,
					
					 I express my deepest respect to Your Excellency upon hearing the historical news that Your Excellency were elected first chairman of the National Defence Commission of your country at a session of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					
					 The people of the DPRK are characterized by their unity and patriotism which ensures the inheritance of their cause.
					
					 Defending the sovereignty of a country guarantees peace, freedom and progress of the nations.
					
					 The Republic of Equatorial Guinea expresses solidarity with the significant political decisions the Korean people have made to realize their ideal.
					
					 Please accept my noblest tribute.

articles.title: National Scientific and Technological Exhibition of Machine Designs Opens
articles.content:
National Scientific and Technological Exhibition of Machine Designs Opens
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The 8th national scientific and technological exhibition of the machine designs opened in the DPRK with due ceremony at the Central Light Industrial Sample Exhibition on Wednesday. 
					 The exhibition will be held, divided into designs of machine products, IT-based designs, designs of machine forms and prize contest. 
					
					 On display there are more than 650 valuable machine designs and form designs, research data for developing designing technology and its ways, machine designing support and mock processing programs, etc. presented by officials and working people in different units across the country. They will contribute to the development of the machine industry and improvement of people's living standard.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Ri Ja Bang, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission, officials concerned, officials, designers, creators, teachers and researchers in the fields of machine designing and industrial art studios from across the country, education and scientific research institutions and workers and technicians of industrial establishments. 
					
					 Kye Hui Nam, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea, made an opening address.

articles.title: National Exhibition of Medical Appliances Held
articles.content:
National Exhibition of Medical Appliances Held
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The third national exhibition of medical appliances was held at the Grand People's Study House on Tuesday and Wednesday.
					 Displayed there were at least 3 900 medical equipment and appliances of more than 90 kinds contrived and produced by industrial establishments and scientific research institutes across the country.
					
					 Highly appreciated by the participants were electrocardiographs, electroencephalographs, programmatic controller of pulse of artificial hearts which introduced latest technology, artificial femoral joint, new appliance for operating leg bone fracture, etc. Also on display were Koryo electronic finger-pressing treatment appliance, appliance for pressing abdominal main artery and other equipment designed for greater effectiveness of treatment.  
					
					 The exhibition involved diverse activities including a scientific and technological symposium and a meeting for sharing experience.  
					
					 Its closing ceremony was held on Wednesday.

articles.title: National Symposium on Greening Cities Held
articles.content:
National Symposium on Greening Cities Held
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- A national scientific and technological symposium on turning cities into thick woodland and greenery took place here on Wednesday under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the Nature Conservation Union of Korea. 
					 Read out at the symposium were valuable papers noticed among achievements made by scientists, technicians and working people in the horticultural field. 
					
					 Speakers said that leader Kim Jong Il indicated tasks and ways for making the whole country woodland and greenery and stressed the need to put floriculture on the scientific and industrial basis when giving field guidance to the Pyongyang Floriculture Institute, in particular. 
					
					 They expressed the will to more dynamically push forward the scientific researches to carry out the important tasks the dear respected Kim Jong Un set forth in his famous work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation". 
					
					 Introduced at the symposium were the specific features of cities that turned into woodland and greenery, the achievements made in establishing production system of major flowering plants and the establishment of the way of cultivating four-season balsam. 
					
					 The papers were highly appreciated for their big practical significance in developing the greening work.

articles.title: Symposium on Architectural Aesthetics Held
articles.content:
Symposium on Architectural Aesthetics Held
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The 7th Symposium on Architectural Aesthetics took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday.
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim In Sik, vice premier and chairman of Capital City Construction Commission, Kim Sok Jun, minister of State Construction Control, Tong Jong Ho, minister of Construction and Building Materials Industry, Kim Chang Ryong, minister of Land and Environmental Conservation, Hwang Hak Won, minister of Urban Management, officials concerned, officials in the fields of architecture building and building materials, designers, technicians, teachers, researchers and creators.
					
					 The floor was taken by Kim Sok Jun, minister of State Construction Control who doubles as chairman of the C.C., the Union of Architects of Korea, Pae Tong Il, president of the Pyongyang University of Construction and Building-Materials Industry who doubles as vice-chairman of the C.C., the Union of Architects of Korea, and others.
					
					 Speakers at the symposium explained the originality of leader Kim Jong Il's idea and theory of architecture and the essential features of architectures praying for the immortality of the leader put forward by him.  
					
					 The originality of Kim Jong Il's idea and theory of architecture lies in that they clarified the fact that the leadership of the leader is a decisive factor on which hinges the successful building of architectures in the socialist society, and newly formulated and systematized the major problems of architecture. 
					
					 Their originality can also be found in that they newly solved the relations between architecture and human being, formulated the architectural theory centered on the popular masses, scientifically clarified the essential features of architecture and termed the work of architecture combined arts.
					
					 Kim Jong Il saw to it that Kim Il Sung was laid in state and supreme temple of Juche was spruced up, thus giving a steady continuity to the history of perpetuating the memory of the President on this land.
					
					 Thanks to the noble loyalty and moral obligation of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were built and set up on Mansu Hill and at the Mansudae Art Studio and on Jangdaejae Hill and towers to their immortality were erected in different parts of the country.
					
					 It is the fundamental demand to build architecture socialist in content while suiting the specific local features, they said, calling for providing the people's conveniences and creating edifices of peculiar shapes.

articles.title: Young Scientists, Key Players in IT Industry in North Phyongan Province
articles.content:
Young Scientists, Key Players in IT Industry in North Phyongan Province
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Young scientists in North Phyongan Province of the DPRK are playing a pivotal role in developing IT industry. 
					 Most of the employees at the IT Management Department and the E-Business Institute in the province are in their twenties and thirties.
					
					 Song Kwang Hun, chief engineer of the Institute, told KCNA:
					
					 "The Institute is staffed with scientists in their twenties, except a few managing officials in thirties including me.
					
					 As graduates of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Pyongyang University of Computer Science and Huichon University of Technology, they are possessed of profound knowledge, filled with energy and vigor.
					
					 In 2001, the inaugural year of the Institute, they developed the neurosis sorting program based on diagnosis index, which placed first in the national festival of science and technology that year. 
					
					 They also developed hundreds of software pieces, including the sound and letter recognition programs which won high appreciation at various local competitions and festivals. 
					
					 Many IT experts in the province make their way to Pyongyang and other cities to help promote the nation's knowledge-based economy."

articles.title: Olympic Shooting Coaching Course Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Olympic Shooting Coaching Course Held in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- An Olympic solidarity shooting coaching course took place in Pyongyang from May 3 to 9.
					 Coaches from various sports teams attended the course, divided into theoretical and practical sessions.
					
					 The course dealt with the training method for improving the players' physical and technical level, the prospect of shooting event at the 30th Olympiad and other issues.
					
					 It was officiated by Tomislav Lazic, a lecturer of the International Shooting Sports Federation.

articles.title: KCNA Detailed Report on Grand Celebration of Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth
articles.content:
KCNA Detailed Report on Grand Celebration of Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency released a detailed report Tuesday on the worldwide celebration of the 100th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's birth.
					 Overseas Koreans and progressives of over 170 countries significantly celebrated the anniversary as an international holiday, a great auspicious event common to humankind, the report said, and went on:
					
					 They held more than 3 000 colorful events and over 12 000 media of the world gave wide publicity to the sacred history of Kim Il Sung's nation.
					
					 The Nordic preparatory committee for celebrating the centenary of the President's birth was formed in August 2008. It was the first of its kind and it was followed by the formation of more than 100 preparatory committees till 2011.
					
					 The preparatory committees organized colorful political and cultural events and held annual general meetings, giving momentum to the festive mood timed for the Day of the Sun.
					
					 The President was presented with prizes, orders, honorary titles, congratulatory banners, gifts, congratulatory messages and floral baskets from world progressives.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, the dear respected Kim Jong Un, anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk were presented with orders, honorary titles, prizes, congratulatory banners and gifts by governments, political parties, organizations, the groups for the study of the Juche idea and people of many countries and international and regional organizations.
					
					 Created at the International Friendship Exhibition House was a wax replica of Kim Jong Suk by the sincerity of the figures of the Hall of Wax Replicas of Great Persons in China.
					
					 More than 230 gifts were presented to the great persons of Mt. Paektu from the different parts of the world on the anniversary.
					
					 Kim Jong Un received at least 700 congratulatory messages and letters from heads of state, leaders of political parties, friendship and solidarity organizations and figures of various strata.
					
					 Figures of political and social circles of dozens of countries visited the DPRK missions and laid at least 800 floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and their full-length portraits.
					
					 The number of delegations which came to the DPRK to celebrate the Day of the Sun reached more than 200 and the World Conference on the Juche Idea was held in Pyongyang.
					
					 The International festival for celebrating the centenary of the birth of the President was held in Mt. Paektu and Pyongyang.
					
					 The 28th April Spring Friendship Art Festival was held with the participation of prominent cultural officials and international and national concours winners and artistes from various countries. The IAAF-25th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon was held with the participation of a number of sportspersons from various countries and regions.
					
					 Meetings, memorial meetings, seminars, book, photo and arts exhibition, film shows, art performances and lots of other political and cultural events were held in a number of countries.
					
					 Colorful events were also held by overseas Koreans, everywhere Koreans resided.
					
					  Joint photo exhibition "Window on North Korea" was held in New York, U.S. on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia festivals were held with splendor in several countries with the number of visitors reaching hundreds of thousands.
					
					 More than 15 278 900 accessed the website of the Internet international seminar hosted by the Korean Friendship Association.
					
					 Figures of various social standings and progressives around the world authored and published scores of books and more than 1 400 articles and poems.
					
					 More than 23 200 copies of the translated versions of works of the peerlessly great persons were published in scores of countries with due ceremonies.
					
					 At least 12 000 newspapers, news agencies, radios, magazines, bulletins and internet websites around the world carried special write-ups carrying portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos dealing with the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: KCNA Labels U.S. Harasser of Peace and Security
articles.content:
KCNA Labels U.S. Harasser of Peace and Security
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The United States announced its plan to conduct an interceptor missile test capable of intercepting five attack missiles simultaneously this year. It is said that the test would be the most complicated and largest-ever military element test. To be involved in this test are Patriot, Aegis and other interceptor missile complexes of various types and mobile radars.
					 This suggests that the U.S. moves to establish MD reached a new grave phase.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. asserts the MD is targeted against the DPRK and Iran, saying that these countries are pushing ahead with a plan for developing inter-continental missiles capable of reaching even to the U.S. mainland.
					
					 It is no more than an excuse for the U.S. to insist that MD is aimed at coping with their missile attacks. 
					
					 The U.S. moves to build a missile shield are designed to put the world within the range of its missile attack and strike other countries as it pleases.
					
					 The U.S. MD makes clearer the structure of pressurizing the Eurasian Continent from both the east and the west.
					
					 It seeks to plug into its MD the member states of NATO in Europe, Japan and Australia in Asia-Pacific, Israel in the Mideast, etc.
					
					 The keynote of the U.S. strategy for world supremacy since the demise of the Cold War era is to prevent the emergence of the forces that may challenge it.
					
					 It is the view of the U.S. that there are powers on the Eurasian Continent likely to challenge it and their potentials are growing stronger more rapidly than expected in recent years.
					
					 With this situation in view, the U.S. seeks to steadily expand and round off the MD in a bid to disable other powers' capability of nuclear retaliation and make its military edge unchallenged.
					
					 It is also its calculation that this is also good for plugging them into an arms race and making their strength exhausted.
					
					 This is evidenced by the facts that the U.S. spent a huge amount of money for MD every year and is contemplating drawing more countries into MD under the pretexts of "joint defense" and "joint research" and is planning to conduct a test for intercepting three medium- and short-range ballistic missiles and two cruise missiles simultaneously.
					
					 The U.S. moves for unchallenged MD are fraught with the potential danger of escalating international tensions and sparking off an arms race among countries and thereby starting a new Cold War.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal wrecking global peace and stability and sparking off an arms race.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Will Perish in Fire: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Will Perish in Fire: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in a recent anti-DPRK confab with the U.S., the 11th joint defense consultative meeting, discussed about developing the "scenario to cope with nuclear threat from the north", citing "provocation" of someone. Meanwhile, Kim Thae Hyo, chief presidential secretary for Foreign Strategy Planning of Chongwadae, flew to the U.S. to discuss with his U.S. master the issue of extending the range of south Korean missiles. 
					 Minju Joson Wednesday runs a bylined commentary in this regard.
					
					 The Lee group condemned by the whole nation for its heinous crimes against the Korean nation has not yet come to its senses, the paper says, and goes on: 
					
					 It is the firm will of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK to skin and beat the group of rat-like Lee Myung Bak to death. 
					
					 The Lee group is made up of cursed traitors who regard confrontation with the fellow countrymen and war moves opposed by the whole nation as a way for prolonging its remaining days. 
					
					 No matter how desperately it may try to remain under the U.S. "nuclear umbrella", it can never escape the shower of fire by Songun Korea ready to mercilessly annihilate those who dared hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the nation. 
					
					 The group of traitors will have to pay dearly for its crimes.
					
					 The traitors will be made to burn to death even before regretting their anti-reunification crimes. 
					
					 The army of Songun does not know mercy.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Military Confab against DPRK Slammed by Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Military Confab against DPRK Slammed by Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The United States held the first south Korea-U.S. "joint defense consultative meeting" with the south Korean puppet forces in Washington shortly ago. 
					 The meeting was attended by the U.S. undersecretary of defense for policy and the counterpart of south Korea, whom can be called persons directly responsible for mapping out a war plan. At the meeting, the U.S. let loose a spate of rubbish like "serious warning against provocation and threat from the north", and worked out "common countermeasure".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 Through the military confab, the U.S. sought to abet confrontation with the DPRK by the group of rat-like Lee Myung Bak and thus escalate the tensions on the Korean Peninsula and ignite a new war at any cost.
					
					 The U.S. warlike forces plan to seize the Korean Peninsula as a base of strategic importance and bridgehead as they attach great significance to implementing the world domination strategy.
					
					 The U.S. has thus persistently pursued the hostile policy toward the DPRK, policy of a war.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK has been pursued so persistent and vicious as to incriminate the sovereign nation's legitimate right to satellite launch granted by the UN Charter and to wage saber-rattling under that pretext. 
					
					 The U.S. anti-DPRK military racket has created such a grave situation on the Korean Peninsula that a total war may break out there any moment.
					
					 The U.S. is deliberately leading the situation to an extreme phase.
					
					 It is mistaken if it thinks it can attain its purpose by doing so. 
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to clearly face up to the reality and behave with discretion.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Anti-DPRK Confrontation Policy Bound to Go Bust: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Anti-DPRK Confrontation Policy Bound to Go Bust: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors ceaselessly committed heinous crimes of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, thereby plunging the north-south relations into the worst catastrophe and exposing the destiny of the nation to growing threats, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a bylined article.
					 The prevailing critical situation is an inevitable product of the anti-DPRK confrontation policy pursued by the Lee group, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 It is natural for the north and south to pool their efforts in their struggle to gain the sovereignty of the nation, and bright future of independent reunification lies in improving the north-south relationship.
					
					 But the Lee group opted for confrontation and escalated tension, not improvement of the north-south relations, independent reunification and peaceful prosperity.
					
					 The group of traitors fostered antagonism, distrust and confrontation between the north and the south in violation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The successive fascist rulers of south Korea found their way out of destructions in escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen and provoking a war.
					
					 The ultimate design of traitor Lee's confrontation policy is also to provoke a war against the DPRK in collusion with outside forces.
					
					 The reality clearly shows that the Lee group of traitors would not hesitate to provoke a fresh war in a bid to realize its sinister design, indifferent to the destiny of the country and nation.
					
					 Anti-DPRK confrontation policy will never help the group of traitors escape from its ruling crisis.
					
					 Seeing the Lee group of traitors keen on confrontation moves, the Korean nation is picturing its tragic doomsday.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Urged to Stop War Provocations
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Urged to Stop War Provocations
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany hit out at the south Korean warmongers for their mad-cap war moves against fellow countrymen.
					 In a joint statement on May 5, the organizations said they can not tolerate the reckless south Korean war maniacs who declared they would not rule out a war, being seized with sycophancy toward the U.S.
					
					 It warned the warmongers that they should know why the U.S. always kneels to the DPRK in a showdown with it. 
					
					 It is ridiculous for the south Korean puppet army serving the U.S. to dare to bluff that it would preemptively strike at the compatriots, the statement said.
					
					 It urged the war maniacs to stop making provocations for war against fellow countrymen.
					
					 They should belatedly commit themselves to implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration not to leave a criminal trace in history.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Dispatch of Team for Investigating Mad Cow Disease Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Dispatch of Team for Investigating Mad Cow Disease Slammed
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities'  dispatch of an investigation team to the U.S. concerning mad cow disease was aimed to deceive the people, said the Internet paper Saram Ilbo in an article on May 6. 
					 The team was only briefed on a research institute and factories while touring them, the article said, and went on: 
					
					 A particular mention should be made of a farm owner who denied the team's access to the farm in which mad cow disease broke out. 
					
					 The people are mostly concerned about the scope of mad cow disease and its seriousness.
					
					 But the team had neither method nor right to confirm it, the article said, adding that the dispatch of the team to the U.S. was just aimed to silence the public.
					
					 The team's activities drew censure from the people as it only made a few visits, not confirming the place where the disease broke out and key problems.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Accuses Japan of Trying to Cover Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Accuses Japan of Trying to Cover Its Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Kukmin Ilbo in an editorial said Japan attempted to hush up its past crimes with money only to face public disgrace.
					 Japan showed off its bulgy moneybag in its reckless attempt for the removal of a monument to the memory of the comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army in New Jersey, U.S. only to disgrace itself in the world eyes, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 Japan's consul general in New York visited the building of a city office in New Jersey where he said Japan would invest huge amount of money in return for the removal of the monument.
					
					 Disgusting, indeed, is the sordid behavior of the Japanese government to cover up the past crimes of Japan with money. Its attempt to remove the monument with the help of a foreign administrative authority is a clear proof that it does not have the feelings of repenting of its past crimes.
					
					 Japan thinks that it can change the history with money, a revelation of a low-level consciousness of an animal.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should immediately stop such a reckless attempt as trying to eclipse the sun with a palm, bearing in mind that the only best way for them is to make apology and reparation to the victims.
					
					 If Japan goes without reflection of history, the second and third monuments to the memory of the comfort women will continue to be built.

articles.title: Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia Exhibitions Held
articles.content:
Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia Exhibitions Held
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia exhibitions took place in various countries and regions in grand scale on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President            Kim Il Sung.
					 The exhibitions drew a huge crowd every day with the total number of visitors reaching 200 000.
					
					 The Kimilsungia exhibition celebrating the Day of the Sun in Indonesia was a veritable sea of flowers of the sun.
					
					 On display in the venue were works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos of their immortal feats and the large painting depicting Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia in full bloom against the background of the rising sun.
					
					 They vividly represented the reverence of the Indonesians for the peerlessly great men.
					
					 The West African regional Kimilsungia exhibition took place in Guinea which was visited by delegates from Mali, Sierra Leone, Cote d' Ivoire and other countries.
					
					 An endless stream of people visited the Jilin, China, Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia exhibition at the Jilin Yuwen High School and the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia exhibitions in Dalian and Dandong of China, amid growing reverence for the great men born of Heaven.
					
					 The reverence of the Russians for Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il also pervaded the venues of exhibitions held in Nakhodka and Vladivostok of Russia.
					
					 Tens of thousands of foreigners and masses from all walks of life visited the venues of the 14th China International Flower and Horticultural Expo and 2012 Netherlands World Horticultural Expo in which Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia were on view.

articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Marked in China
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- A book, photo and fine arts exhibition of the DPRK to celebrate the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung took place in Beijing between May 2 and 7.
					 On display in the venue were works of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, photos showing their immortal revolutionary careers and exploits and fine arts pieces associated with creative skill of the Korean people.
					
					 Speeches were made at the opening ceremony.
					
					 The speakers said that the undying feats performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in strengthening the China-DPRK friendship would remain forever in the hearts of the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 Saying that the exhibition would contribute to deepening mutual understanding of the peoples of the two countries, they reiterated their will to make positive contribution to boosting the DPRK-China friendship.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Nigerian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Nigerian Paper
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian paper Nigerian Observer on May 1 carried the detailed gist of the talk the dear respected Kim Jong Un had with leading officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on April 6, 2012. The work is titled "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche."
					 The work says that it is the principled requirement for the victorious advance of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It indicates the task for steadily developing the WPK into a glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Nepali Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Nepali Paper
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The Nepali paper Arpan on April 27 carried the full text of the speech the dear respected Kim Jong Un made at the military parade on April 15, 2012 celebrating the centenary of the birth of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
					 The paper carried a photo of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He said that the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation proved the immutable truth that the dignity and prosperity of the country and nation hinge on the outstanding leader.
					
					 The speech expounded the idea that the ever-victorious history of the Korean People's Army secured the glorious 100-year history of Juche Korea and that it will provide a sure guarantee for the eternity of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 It set forth the task to demonstrate the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and to successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist country.

articles.title: Floral Tributes to Liberation Tower and Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of Soviet Army
articles.content:
Floral Tributes to Liberation Tower and Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of Soviet Army
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Members of the Russian embassy here laid a wreath at the Liberation Tower on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the great Patriotic War of Russia on May 9.
					 Present there were Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador, members of his embassy, diplomatic envoys of foreign embassies and the military attaches here.
					
					 They laid a wreath in the name of the embassy before paying a silent tribute to the memory of the fallen fighters of the Soviet army.
					
					 They laid a wreath and bunches of flowers at the cemetery of the fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Sadong district, Pyongyang city.
					
					 Earlier, they laid bunches of flowers at the liberation towers, statues and cemeteries of the fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in local areas.

articles.title: Dmitri Rogozin on Development of Space Technology
articles.content:
Dmitri Rogozin on Development of Space Technology
 Moscow, May 8 (KCNA) -- Dmitri Rogozin, deputy prime minister of Russia, called for developing space technology on May 5.
					 He underscored the need to make efforts to develop indigenous technology, not just following others in the development of space technology and thus have an edge in space.
					
					 Noting that it is one of the major tasks facing Russia, he noted that the project for the building of a space launch site would help attain the goal.

articles.title: Iran Discloses Imperialists' Black-hearted Intention
articles.content:
Iran Discloses Imperialists' Black-hearted Intention
 Tehran, May 8 (KCNA) -- The deputy minister of Culture of Iran on May 5 revealed the black-hearted intention of the imperialists at a diplomatic meeting.
					 He said that the world is now towards peace and justice. Peace and justice are the cause of all human beings but international imperialism does not wish to see the world come close to materializing this objective.
					
					 He said that the imperialists applied sanctions and put pressure against Iran to bar it from developing nuclear program for peaceful purposes only to have led to the progress of his country.

articles.title: Weak Point of U.S. F-22 Raptors Sparks Furor
articles.content:
Weak Point of U.S. F-22 Raptors Sparks Furor
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The critical weak point of fighters of the U.S. Air Force was disclosed, sparking big furor. 
					 As known to the world, the U.S. invested huge fund in producing new type F-22 Raptors of the new generation.
					
					 F-22 Raptor, a multi-purpose fighter, was jointly developed by military monopolies Lockheed Martin, General Dynamics and Boeing Co. to replace F-15 fighters.
					
					 A group of pilots of the U.S. Air Force recently refused to make flights aboard F-22 Raptors.
					
					 The reason was that hypoxia in a cockpit is common occurrences during flight. 
					
					 A pilot died of hypoxia when making flight above Alaska in November 2010 and the plane ended up in a crash.
					
					 The hypoxia in F-22 Raptors happened more than ten times, but the cause has not yet been found out. 
					
					 The manufacturers of the plane deliberately lowered the flight altitude of the fighters as a stop-gap measure but the lack of oxygen is so serious as to make pilot faint.
					
					 Pilots have thus become reluctant to make flight aboard such fighters which threaten their lives.
					
					 A spokesman for the U.S. Air Force officially admitted that pilots are feeling uneasy about it.
					
					 A number of doctors and psychologists as well as engineers and analysts went busy setting up a special filter for measuring the concentration of poisonous materials in a cockpit. This resulted in a story that poisonous materials could be formed during flight.
					
					 More than 190 Raptors have so far been produced costing huge fund for their manufacture. The production of the fighters has thus been suspended with their weak point being brought to light.
					
					 It serves the U.S. right as it defied the demand of the working majority for the rights to work and live and spent huge money to arms buildup to attain its ambition to dominate the world.

articles.title: Drug-Abuses Rampant among U.S. Soldiers in Afghanistan
articles.content:
Drug-Abuses Rampant among U.S. Soldiers in Afghanistan
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Drug abuses prevalent among American troops in Afghanistan are troubling the U.S. government and military, being jeered by the international community.
					 A recent AP report said eight American soldiers in Afghanistan were confirmed to have died of drug abuses in 2010 and 2011. 
					
					 This was disclosed when the U.S. Army Command in Afghanistan investigated 56 American soldiers on the suspicion of drug processing and use. 
					
					 The number of the soldiers who were tested positive for heroine increased to 116 in fiscal 2010 from 10 in fiscal 2002. 
					
					 During more than a decade of the U.S. occupation, opium cultivation and drug smuggling have run rampant in Afghanistan, degrading the country to a drug-producer.
					
					 That is not the sole major cause of drug addicts increasing among the American soldiers. 
					
					 The soldiers being hurled to an "anti-terror war" in Afghanistan suffer from extreme uneasiness and fear day in, day out. 
					
					 The U.S. death toll from the attacks by the resistance forces that have become unabated since the beginning of the war stands at more than 1 850. 
					
					 Melancholy and fear have become common diseases among the American soldiers there. 
					
					 The U.S. military bases are prescribing a drug as medicine to treat the disease which is only giving rise to the number of drug addicts. 
					
					 Now the U.S. soldiers widely use the drug calling it "Afghani dip".
					
					 Afghanistan is turning into a huge grave of the drug-addicted U.S. troops. 
					
					 This is natural for the U.S. to face such a result as it has defied the unanimous demand of the international community for an immediate stop to the reckless war of aggression and withdrawal of its troops.

articles.title: Europe Hobbled by Financial Crisis
articles.content:
Europe Hobbled by Financial Crisis
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The financial crisis that started in Greece has spread to the whole Europe, sparking off social uneasiness as there is no hope for its solution.
					 Public is of the view that the Greek financial crisis has had serious impacts on the European economy and its way out is not yet in sight.
					
					 The Greek Statistics Authority ELSTAT recently announced Greek national debt hit 355.6 billion euros (467.08 billion U.S. dollars) in 2011.
					
					 Germany public deficit was 25.3 billion euros (33.8 billion dollars) last year and in Spain deficit increased 14.2 percent from the last year, occupying the 68.5 percent of the GDP.
					
					 Unemployment rate is increasing amid towering national deficit.
					
					 Greek jobless rate hit a new record high at 21 percent in December 2011.
					
					 Some 365,900 more people became unemployed in Spain this quarter, reaching to a record 5,639,500 while in Britain its rate was 2.65 million in the December-February period.
					
					 Many people are committing suicide in despair to rid them of hard life caused by the unjust austerity policy and lay-off measure taken by the authorities.
					
					 Early in April a 77-year old man shot himself to death in a square in Athens.
					
					 The reason was that his living condition was pushed to the lowest level due to the ceaseless austerity measure by the authorities.
					
					 Meanwhile, in a northern area of Italy a building contractor committed suicide at last being dunned for his debt and a Moroccan emigrant burnt himself to death as not receiving his wage for months.
					
					 The reality clearly proves that capitalist society is, indeed, a corrupt one with no future.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre el Parque de Atracciones de Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre el Parque de Atracciones de Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, 9 de mayo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio el Parque de Atracciones de Mangyongdae.
					Kim Jong Un averiguo en detalles la situacion de administracion y operacion del parque recorriendo varios puntos.
					
					Sobre todo, hizo conocimiento del estado de vialidad interior y reforestacion del Parque.
					
					Llegado ante el columpio, critico el mal estado de la vialidad interior seriamente deteriorada preguntando cuando ella ha sido pavimentada la ultima vez.
					
					Al distinguir que la parte abajo de los arboles de la vida y los de incienso no fue ordenada debidamente, dijo que seria bueno si se colocaran las guijas de diferentes formas alrededor de los arboles.
					
					Cuando vio las malas hierbas brotadas en las junturas de bloques de acera, se persono afligido a sacarlas una por una objetando la negligencia de los funcionarios del Parque. 
					
					Si ustedes tuvieran la posicion de dueno, el apego al centro de trabajo y la conciencia de servicio al pueblo, es imposible que trabajen como ahora, reprocho y prosiguio que la limpieza de maleza se puede hacer facilmente a mano y no requiere de recursos financieros como renovacion de equipos.
					
					Nunca he imaginado que este Parque fuera tan descuidado como ahora, dijo y agrego enojado que este lugar es el muy defectuoso aunque esta enclavado en el centro urbano.
					
					Estan en operacion los aparatos de atraccion que ni siquiera fueron pintados, dijo y anadio que los administradores del parque no tienen ni un comino de la voluntad de servir al pueblo.
					
					Esto no es un problema de trabajo sino el tema relacionado con el punto de vista ideologico, critico en tono severo.
					
					Ante la fuente de surtidores, dijo que puede haber condiciones que impidan la operacion de ella, pero mantenerla limpia y ordenada es un quehacer que se puede cumplir si se le presta atencion.
					
					Los funcionarios deben sacar seria leccion de la visita a este Parque de Atracciones y hace falta emitir advertencia en esta ocasion para que tengan correcto espiritu de servicio al pueblo.
					
					Instruyo remozar el Parque a las alturas de la era del Songun, destacando que el proceso de reconstruccion debe ser una oportunidad para eliminar el viejo modo de pensar y trabajar latente en los funcionarios
					
					Al enumerar las tareas correspondientes, indico al jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, Choe Ryong Hae, que mandara al Parque una brigada de constructores militares competentes para transformarlo a las alturas del nuevo siglo.
					
					Enfatizo que los funcionarios del Comite del PTC en la ciudad de Pyongyang, los ministerios y organos centrales y otros sectores interesados deben cumplir con la mision y responsabilidad, que les tocan en la obra de reconstruccion, para materializar en la practica el proposito del partido de trabajar para el pueblo.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Choe Ryong Hae y el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un toma foto con participantes en la Conferencia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un toma foto con participantes en la Conferencia
Pyongyang, 9 de mayo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea tomo foto de recuerdo junto con los participantes en la Conferencia de Activistas en el Movimiento por la Movilizacion General de Administracion Territorial.
					El respondio calurosamente a las efusivas aclamaciones de ellos.
					
					Kim Jong Un expreso la esperanza y la conviccion de que todos los militares y civiles del pais, sobre todo, los participantes en la conferencia lleven a feliz termino sin recesion alguna, ni un paso atras, hasta el fin y cabalmente la idea y el legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en materia de la administracion territorial y renueven por completo la fisonomia del territorio nacional a la altura de un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					Estuvieron presentes los cuadros directivos de las instituciones del partido, el Estado y las fuerzas armadas: Choe Yong Rim, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Ki Nam, Ri Myong Su, Mun Kyong Dok, Ro Tu Chol y Ri Ryong Ha y los secretarios responsables del Comite del PTC en las provincias.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe presente de personalidad rusa
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe presente de personalidad rusa
Pyongyang, 9 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo Kim Jong Un recibio el presente que con motivo del centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, le dedicara el editor jefe del periodico ruso "Patriot".
					El presente fue entregado a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Cursillo de entrenadores de tiro de solidaridad de Olimpiada
articles.content:
Cursillo de entrenadores de tiro de solidaridad de Olimpiada
Pyongyang, 9 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del 3 al 9 en esta capital el cursillo de entrenadores de tiro de solidaridad de Olimpiada dividido en la teoria y practica, en el cual estuvieron presentes los entrenadores de varios equipos deportivos.
					En la ocasion se abordo el metodo de entrenamiento para elevar mas el nivel fisico y tecnico de los tiradores, la perspectiva de competencia de tiro de los XXX Juegos Olimpicos y otros temas.
					
					Presidio el cursillo el lector de la Federacion Internacional de Deportes de Tiro Tomislav Lazic (38 anos de edad).

articles.title: ACNC califica a EE.UU. de perturbador de paz y estabilidad
articles.content:
ACNC califica a EE.UU. de perturbador de paz y estabilidad
Pyongyang, 9 de mayo (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos publico el plan de realizar este ano la prueba de misiles interceptores capaces de aniquilar simultaneamente 5 misiles de ataque. Esto sera la prueba de elementos militares mas complicados y de maxima dimension en la historia, en la cual se movilizaran el complejo de misiles interceptores de distintos tipos como "Patriot" y "Aegis" y el detector de radar movil. 
					El hecho insinua que ha llegado a una nueva etapa peligrosa el intento de EE.UU. para establecer el sistema de defensa antimisil.
					
					El imperio insiste en que el blanco de su sistema antimisiles es la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea e Iran pretextando que esos paises promueven el plan de desarrollo de misiles balisticos intercontinentales que alcanzaran hasta el territorio estadounidense.
					
					El sistema antimisiles de EE.UU. no es para evitar el ataque de misiles de la RPDC e Iran, sino para atacar a sus caprichos a cualquier pais poniendolos en la esfera de golpe de misiles.
					
					La red de defensa antimisil de EE.UU. se forma con la estructura de apretar desde el este y el oeste el continente euroasiatico. 
					
					EE.UU. quiere introducir en su sistema antimisiles a los miembros de la OTAN en Europa, a Japon y Australia en la region de Asia-Pacifico, a Israel y otros en el Medio Oriente.
					
					La clave de la estrategia del imperio para tomar la supremacia mundial despues de la guerra fria es frenar de antemano la aparicion de las fuerzas capaces de desafiar a si mismo. 
					
					EE.UU. considera que en el continente euroasiatico existen las potencias con posibilidades de tales desafios y que en estos momentos sus potencialidades se aumentan mas rapido que lo  previsto.  
					
					Es por eso que EE.UU. intenta ampliar y perfeccionar de continuo el sistema de defensa antimisil a fin de neutralizar la capacidad de represalia nuclear de otras potencias y absolutizar  su supremacia militar.
					
					Calcula  que esto seria bueno para introducir a las potencias euroasiaticas a la carrera armamentista y debilitarlas. 
					
					En ese contexto, el imperio gasta cada ano enormes fondos al establecimiento del sistema de defensa antimisil, pretende introducir en este sistema mas paises bajo el pretexto de la "defensa conjunta" y la "investigacion conjunta". Y al mismo tiempo, intenta realizar la prueba de interceptar simultaneamente 3 misiles balisticos de medios y cortos alcances y  2 misiles cruceros. 
					
					La campana de EE.UU. tendente a establecer el sistema antimisil de caracter hegemonico puede exacerbar la tension internacional e incitar la carrera armamentista entre los paises y resucitar una nueva guerra fria. 
					
					EE.UU. es el autor de la perturbacion de la paz y la estabilidad del mundo y de la carrera armamentista.

articles.title: Fusiles de Corea no perdonaran a horda de Lee, insiste Minju Joson
articles.content:
Fusiles de Corea no perdonaran a horda de Lee, insiste Minju Joson
Pyongyang, 9 de mayo (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, la banda de Lee Myung Bak del Sur de Corea convoco junto con Estados Unidos la llamada primera reunion de consejo conjunto de defensa, en la cual se acordaron desarrollar el "guion para hacer frente a la amenaza nuclear del Norte (de Corea)" hablando de la "provocacion" de alguien.
					Por otra parte, el jefe de la Planificacion de Estrategia Exterior de Chongwadae, Kim Thae Hyo, converso en secreto en EE.UU. con su amo sobre el tema de alargar el alcance de sus misiles.
					
					En su comentario individual divulgado este miercoles, el rotativo Minju Joson asevera que no volvio en si la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak, repudiado por toda la nacion por sus imperdonables crimenes cometidos ante la nacion coreana, y prosigue:
					
					Aplastar por completo a la horda ratonesca de Lee es la voluntad de los uniformados y civiles coreanos.
					
					Los compinches ratoneros de Lee son los traidores sin precedentes que consideran como su linea vital la confrontacion fratricida y la campana de guerra.
					
					Aunque la banda del traidor Lee este bajo el amparo del "paraguas nuclear" de Estados Unidos para mantener su asquerosa vida restante, nunca podra evitar el fuego de las fuerzas armadas de la RPDC.
					
					Los traidores pagaran con sangre el precio de sus crimenes de haber insultado la maxima dignidad de la RPDC. 
					
					La horda ratonera de Lee Myung Bak morira en medio de la lluvia de fuegos del Songun sin tener ni el tiempo para arrepentirse de su crimen antinacional y anti-reunificacion.
					
					Los fusiles del Songun no saben la piedad.

articles.title: "F-22 Raptor" de EE.UU. causa escandalo por su defecto fundamental
articles.content:
"F-22 Raptor" de EE.UU. causa escandalo por su defecto fundamental
Pyongyang, 9 de mayo (ACNC) -- En estos dias, los aviones de combate de las fuerzas aereas norteamericanas muestran los defectos graves.
					Como es conocido, Estados Unidos gasto enormes fondos para producir los aviones de combate ultramodernos de nueva generacion "F-22 Raptor".
					
					"F-22 Raptor", avion de combate de multi-objetivo, fue producido en comun por los monopolios militares, inclusive Lockheed Martin, General Dynamics, la compania Boeing, para sustituir el "F-15".
					
					Sin embargo, hace poco los pilotos norteamericanos negaron en colectivo tomar "F-22 Raptor" porque sigue surgiendo el fenomeno de escasez de oxigeno en el gabinete de control durante el vuelo.
					
					Ya en noviembre de 2010 en Alaska un aeronauta murio y el avion se hizo anicos por tal fenomeno.
					
					Aunque surgio tal fenomeno en mas de diez veces, no han buscado todavia su motivo.
					
					Los elaboradores de aviones tomaron medidas como rebajar artificialmente la altura de aviacion pero paso lo mismo hasta que el piloto se desmayara.
					
					El vocero de las fuerzas aereas norteamericanas reconocio oficialmente la inquietud de los pilotos.
					
					Muchos ingenieros, analistas, medicos y psicologos colocaron el filtro especial para medir la densidad de materiales toxicos difundidos en el gabinete de piloto y sacaron una teoria de que se podrian brotar los materiales toxicos durante la aviacion.
					
					Ya fue paralizada la produccion de aviones "F-22 Raptor" por su enorme fondo gastado en la elaboracion de unos 190. De mal en peor esta vez fueron descubiertos tales defectos fundamentales.
					
					Esto es precio merecido para EE.UU. que no haciendo caso de la demanda de la mayoria parte de trabajadores de asegurar el derecho al trabajo y a la vida, invierte enormes dineros en el aumento armamentista para realizar su ambicion de tomar hegemonia en el mundo.
